description: head and shoulders of a young man with head turned slightly to the right; a row of houses with pointed roofs sit just behind his shoulders in the background with the remainder 3/4 of the background above the houses done in black
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: E 88 / -AA- / -Stein II | LLC and LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2178
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23 | LL of sheet, in pencil: Männerkopf
title: Man's Head with Houses
